item.description:
Come see Comedy Stars at Mission Oak Grill



New England's Best Comedians perform to benefit Newburyport Yankee Homecoming 2009



There will be 4 comedians tonight Steve Bjork, Newburyport's own Bob Seibel, Sal Votano and the Host Dave Rattigan.

Tickets are $20.00 in advance ($25 on night-of-show)

-----For a PG-13 show-----

Showtime 8 p.m., doors open at 7
Mission Oak Grill
26 Green Street, Newburyport, (978) 463-9009

www.ScampsComedy.com


Newburyport steeped in history - is an easy reach from many cities and towns in Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Maine and Connecticut! We are only a 45 minute drive from Boston. our seaport town of Newburyport the Home of the U.S. Coast Guard offers fun days of boating, fishing, shopping, antiques, and fun for the entire family! We hope that you choose to spend some of your summer with us during our festivities. I am sure that each and every one of your family members will find activities during this eight day celebration July 26th through August 2nd they will enjoy. The Evening Waterfront Concerts, as most Yankee Homecoming events, are FREE!

I will update this page as the date gets closer as to where you can buy your ticket(s) in advance.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be outside by the entrance.
item.name: Comedy Stars at Mission Oak Grill a fundraiser for Yankee Homecoming
